full_summary:
**Title**: [BPM021121 - NGINX Software Subscription Licenses, Maintenance, and Support for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada]

**Reference Number**: SSC-24-00026025
**Notice Type**: Request for Quotation (RQ)
**Notice Date**: March 11, 2024
**Closing Date**: March 22, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
**Contracting Authority**: Shared Services Canada
**Contact Information**:

* Name: Agnes Kowalska
* Phone: 343-551-9034
* Fax: 000-000-0000
* Email: [Not Available]
* Address: Data Centers and Internal Services, Shared Services Canada 180 Kent Street, 13th Floor, PO Box 9808, STS T, Ottawa, Ontario, K1G 4A8, Canada

**Description of Requirement**:

Shared Services Canada invites bids for the provision of NGINX software subscription licenses, maintenance, and support services for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada located in Ottawa, Ontario. The requirement is outlined in the attached Request for Quotation document.

**Bid Requirements**:

* Suppliers must submit their bids electronically to the Contracting Authority's email.
* Bids must comply with all requirements outlined in the Request for Quotation document.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Commercial Considerations**:

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Procurement Method**:

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Trade Agreements**:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity**:

* Canada

**Regions of Delivery**:

* Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* National Capital Region

**Goods or Services**:

* NGINX software subscription licenses
* Maintenance and support services for the software

**Additional Documents**:

* Request for Quotation document
* Attachment 1: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/607A42FD-D93E-489A-BFDC-EDD2F8F091ED
* Attachment 2: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/71EE7E29-4E69-4AF8-BBB7-172D328
